Flour 1 cup 

Caster sugar 3/4 cup 

Cocoa powder 2 tbsp 

Baking powder 2 tsp 

Salt 1/4 tsp 

Milk 1/2 cup 

Oil 2 tbsp 

Vanilla essence 1 tsp 

Chopped walnuts 1/2 cup 

Packed brown sugar 3/4 cup 

Cocoa powder 1/4 cup 

Boiling water 

Vanilla ice cream (optional) to serve

1. Stir together the flour, caster sugar, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. 

2. Stir in the milk, oil, and vanilla. Stir in the walnuts. 

3. Pour batter into greased 8-inch square pan. 

4. In a small bowl stir together the brown sugar and 1/4 cup cocoa powder. 

5. Stir in the boiling water. 

6. Slowly pour brown sugar mixture over batter. 

7. Bake in the preheated oven for 40 minutes. 

8. Transfer to a wire rack and cool for 45 to 60 minutes. 

9. Spoon cake into dessert bowls and spoon pudding from the bottom of the pan over cake. Serve with vanilla ice cream. 

10. Serve warm.
